threat: If a user were tricked into opening a specially crafted FIT image file, an attacker could cause GIMP to crash.
If a user were tricked into opening a specially crafted KiSS palette file, an attacker could cause GIMP to crash, or possibly execute arbitrary code with the user's privileges.
If a user were tricked into opening a specially crafted GIF image file, an attacker could cause GIMP to crash, or possibly execute arbitrary code with the user's privileges.
special:
The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:
In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
